name: Flower Opera
description:
Flower Opera takes you on a journey to inspire your senses, open your mind, and heal your heart. Imagine a flower that sings an aria or buds that resemble the splendor of a famous libretto.

Flower Opera movie inspired by Flower Opera book by Tery Spataro, published in March 2021. 

Flower Opera is a short 1:51 movie that features the Lakmé - Duo des fleurs (Flower Duet) performed by Skylight Pictures titled: Flower Song Vocalise 3, comprised of Flower Opera photos from Tery Spataro's book Flower Opera, and in collaboration with Playform.io AI.

Each purchase of the Flower Opera movie includes an ebook of Flower Opera by Tery Spataro.
